meanings.definition: A compound of fluorine with another element or radical.
meanings.sent1: The dentist applied fluoride to protect my teeth from cavities.
meanings.sent2: The water in our town is treated with fluoride to improve dental health.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally mistook fluoride for sugar and almost put it in my coffee!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as fluoride, shining with confidence.
meanings.sent5: The fluoride coating on the tooth made it gleam like a diamond.

meanings.definition: A salt or ester of hydrofluoric acid, containing the anion F- or the element fluorine.
meanings.sent1: The toothpaste we use contains fluoride to strengthen our teeth.
meanings.sent2: The dentist recommended a fluoride treatment to prevent tooth decay.
meanings.sent3: I sprinkled a little extra fluoride on my food, thinking it was salt!
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like fluoride under the bright lights of the stage.
meanings.sent5: The fluoride in the mouthwash left a refreshing sensation after rinsing.
